description: MTL file, short for Material Template Library, is companion file format used in 3D computer graphics and modeling. It is often associated with Wavefront OBJ file format, which is common format for storing 3D models and their associated materials and textures.

instructions:
MTL file are text based files, so they can be opened with any text editor including

Notepad (Windows)Notepad++ (Windows)Visual Studio CodeSublime TextAtomTextEdit (macOS)

Programs that open or reference MTL files include

Adobe Photoshop 2023Autodesk Maya 2023MeshLabCheetah3D
